mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PREORDER (PREORDER_ID, FOOD_ID, MEMBER_ID, PREORDER_AMOUNT, PICKUP_DATE, IS_PICK_UP, IS_EXPIRED_ORDER) VALUES(PREORDER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{foodId}, #{memberId}, #{preorderAmount}, #{pickupDate}, #{isPickUp}, #{isExpiredOrder})
mapper.update: UPDATE PREORDER SET IS_PICK_UP = #{isPickUp} WHERE PREORDER_ID = #{preorderId}
UPDATE PREORDER SET IS_EXPIRED_ORDER = #{isExpiredOrder} WHERE PREORDER_ID = #{preorderId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PREORDER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY PREORDER_ID DESC
